title: Duane

He was hired to guard something (or possibly someone), but who or what that is, he can't tell you. If he did, he'd have to kill you. In fact, he'd like to just kill you anyway.}} ==Useful Info== '''Duane''' was a weak human [[unique]]. Spells: [[Magic Dart]] (3d6), [[Slow]], [[Haste]], and [[Blink]]. ==Tips & Tricks== High [[magic resistance]] or an [[amulet of resist slowing]] will protect you from [[Slow]]. ==History== Duane had his flavor text updated and his experience value cut in [[0.6]], and was removed in [[0.8]] [[Category:Obsolete monsters]] [[Category:Human]]
